description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指20世纪中期第二次世界大战中，中国抵抗日本侵略的全面战争。
description.en: Refers to the comprehensive war of resistance fought by China against Japanese aggression during World War II in the mid-20th century.

en: Fangnan Working Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 郧房县的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative authority of Yunfang County.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通称中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

nodes.id: 中南军政委员会财政部

zh-cn: 中南军政委员会财政部
en: Ministry of Finance of the South-Central Military and Administrative Commission
Standing Committee of the Gansu Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 许飞青早年曾参加过抗日战争。
description.en: Xu Feiqing participated in the Second Sino-Japanese War in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 许飞青曾担任中共房南工委书记。
description.en: Xu Feiqing served as the Secretary of the Fangnan Working Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 许飞青曾担任郧房县副县长。
description.en: Xu Feiqing served as the Deputy County Magistrate of Yunfang County.

relationships.target: 中南军政委员会财政部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，许飞青担任中南军政委员会财政部处长。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Xu Feiqing served as the Section Chief of the Ministry of Finance of the South-Central Military and Administrative Commission.

description.zh-cn: 许飞青曾升任西安市革命委员会副主任。
description.en: Xu Feiqing was promoted to Deputy Director of the Xi'an Municipal Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 许飞青曾担任甘肃省财办主任。
description.en: Xu Feiqing served as the Director of the Gansu Provincial Finance Office.

description.zh-cn: 1979年，许飞青升任甘肃省人民政府副省长，直至1985年转任。
description.en: In 1979, Xu Feiqing was promoted to Vice Governor of the Gansu Provincial People's Government, a position he held until his transfer in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，许飞青转任甘肃省人大常委会副主任。
description.en: In 1985, Xu Feiqing was transferred to the position of Deputy Director of the Standing Committee of the Gansu Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 1988年，许飞青升任甘肃省人大常委会主任。
description.en: In 1988, Xu Feiqing was promoted to Director of the Standing Committee of the Gansu Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 许飞青是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Xu Feiqing was a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 许飞青是第八届全国人大代表。
description.en: Xu Feiqing was a delegate to the 8th National People's Congress.
